origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'DataAnalysisAPI.fetch_financial_data', 'description': 'This function retrieves financial data for a specific sector over a defined time frame.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The sector for which financial data is required, e.g., tourism, retail.'}, {'name': 'dataType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of financial data to fetch, e.g., financing, revenue.'}, {'name': 'timeFrame', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time frame for the data, e.g., current_year, last_quarter.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'financialData', 'description': 'A dataset containing the requested financial information.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 DataAnalysisAPI.fetch_financial_data, 它的参数输入如下: 'sector'是'tourism', 'dataType'是'financing', 'timeFrame'是'current_year'.
